description: Polymarket is a prediction market platform that allows users to bet on the outcomes of various global events using cryptocurrency. Polymarket operates on the Ethereum blockchain, utilizing the Polygon network to enhance scalability and reduce transaction costs. Users connect to the platform through an Ethereum-compatible wallet and use the USDC stablecoin to place bets on events, ranging from political outcomes to entertainment predictions​.
categories: Cryptocurrency, Financial Services, Prediction Markets, Predictive Analytics

description: TRM Labs is a blockchain intelligence company that helps financial institutions, crypto businesses, and government agencies detect and investigate crypto-related financial crime and fraud. Our products are trusted by leading companies including PayPal, Visa, FTX, Uniswap, Anchorage, and federal agencies such as the FBI and IRS. Every day, we tackle challenges in data engineering, data science, and threat intelligence to advance our mission to build a safer financial system for billions of people. To accomplish our mission, we have raised over $79M from JPMorgan Chase, Visa, Citi, PayPal, Block, Tiger Global, and Bessemer. Our team is made up of world class experts from the FBI, U.S. Secret Service, US Treasury Department, McKinsey, Coinbase, and top-tier tech companies. TRM is a remote-first workplace, with hubs in San Francisco, Washington, DC, and London.
categories: Big Data, Blockchain, Compliance, Cryptocurrency

description: Rain provides infrastructure for stablecoin-powered payments and financial products for businesses. The company builds APIs and tools that let partners create and manage digital wallets, embed stablecoin accounts, and issue payment cards that connect blockchain settlement with traditional payment networks like Visa. Its platform supports money-in and money-out flows, fiat-to-stablecoin conversion, and compliance features so enterprises and financial platforms can integrate digital money use cases directly into their products. Rain’s technology is modular, enabling firms to pick components such as card issuance, wallet services, and cross-border payouts based on their needs.
categories: Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, Decentralized Finance (DeFi), FinTech, Web3

description: Tools for Humanity is a technology company building for humans in the age of AI. The company is currently building the tools to bring blockchain and digital identity technologies and products to people by contributing to the development and growth of the World ecosystem and other projects.
categories: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Blockchain, Hardware, Software

description: Coinme operates the largest licensed cryptocurrency cash exchange in the U.S. Founded in 2014 with the simple belief that buying digital currencies should be easy and accessible to everyone, Coinme powers thousands of physical locations in 48 states to buy and sell bitcoin using cash through partnerships with Coinstar and MoneyGram. The company offers an enterprise-grade API that helps “crypto-enable” legacy financial systems and a vertically integrated suite of consumer products that provide an easy and secure way to buy, sell, store, and manage digital currencies.
categories: Bitcoin, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, FinTech, Virtual Currency

Yuga Labs is a blockchain technology company that develops NFTs and digital collectibles. It specializes in the fields of blockchain, cryptocurrency, and digital media.

Yuga Labs was founded in 2021 by Wylie Aronow and Greg Solano and headquartered in Miami, Florida.

description: CertiK is a pioneer in blockchain security, leveraging best-in-class AI technology to protect and monitor blockchain protocols and smart contracts. Founded in 2018 by professors from Yale University and Columbia University, CertiK’s mission is to secure the web3 world. CertiK applies cutting-edge innovations from academia to enterprise, enabling mission-critical applications to scale with safety and correctness.
categories: Blockchain, Cyber Security, Software, Web3

description:
Public is the investing platform built for those who take it seriously—with technology that makes building a multi-asset portfolio, fast, frictionless, and secure.

Members can invest in stocks, options, bonds, crypto, and contribute to retirement accounts —in the same place. Alongside the robust suite of investing tools, Public offers Alpha, a proprietary AI layer, that provides fundamental data and custom analysis to support informed investment decisions.
categories: Cryptocurrency, FinTech, Stock Exchanges, Trading Platform

description:
Anchorage Digital is a regulated crypto platform that provides institutions with integrated financial services and infrastructure solutions. With the only federally chartered crypto bank in the US, as well as Anchorage Digital Singapore, which offers equivalent security and service standards, Anchorage Digital provides institutions an unparalleled combination of secure custody, regulatory compliance, product breadth, and client service. 

Founded in 2017, Anchorage Digital is valued at over $3 billion with funding from leading institutions including Andreessen Horowitz, GIC—Singapore’s sovereign wealth fund, Goldman Sachs, KKR, and Visa. Headquartered in San Francisco, California, Anchorage Digital is remote-friendly with offices in New York, New York; Porto, Portugal; Singapore; and Sioux Falls, South Dakota. Learn more at anchorage.com, on Twitter @Anchorage, and on LinkedIn.
categories: Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, Financial Services, FinTech, Software

description:
Fordefi is a technology company that specializes in providing decentralized finance (DeFi) solutions and services. The platform aims to empower users by offering innovative financial products and tools that leverage blockchain technology, enabling secure and transparent transactions.

Fordefi focuses on creating an accessible ecosystem for users to engage in various financial activities, such as lending, borrowing, and trading cryptocurrencies. The platform is designed to provide users with greater control over their financial assets, eliminating the need for traditional intermediaries.

In addition to its core DeFi offerings, Fordefi emphasizes user education and community engagement, helping users understand the benefits and risks associated with decentralized finance. By fostering a supportive environment, the company aims to promote the adoption of DeFi solutions.
categories: Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, FinTech, Software, Web3

description: Helix is the leading population genomics company working at the intersection of clinical care, research, and genomics. Its end-to-end platform enables health systems, life sciences companies, and payers to advance genomic research and accelerate the integration of genomic data into clinical care. Powered by one of the world's largest CLIA / CAP next-generation sequencing labs and its proprietary Exome+™ assay, Helix supports all aspects of population genomics including recruitment and engagement, clinically actionable disease screening, return of results, and basic and translational research.
categories: Big Data, Bioinformatics, Biotechnology, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, FinTech, Genetics, Health Care, Personal Health

description: Unstoppable Domains launches domains secured by blockchains and builds uncensorable websites. The company offers NFT domains that give people control of their digital identity. Its usernames can be used to log into more than 150 Web3 applications, shorten crypto wallet addresses, and build a decentralized Web3 identity.
categories: Blockchain, Domain Registrar, Internet, Non-Fungible Token (NFT), Web3

description: Nous Research is a decentralized AI startup that focuses on developing open-source, human-centric artificial intelligence models and tools. Its work encompasses large language model architecture, data synthesis, fine-tuning, and reasoning, aiming to align AI systems with real-world user experiences. In addition to model development, the organization emphasizes decentralized AI training. It utilizes blockchain technology, specifically the Solana network, to coordinate and incentivize global participation in training its AI models. This approach allows individuals worldwide to contribute idle computing power for AI training, promoting a more distributed and collaborative development process.
categories: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Blockchain, Open Source, Product Search

description: Brale provides a platform for creating and managing stablecoins. The platform enables the issuance, redemption, and treasury management of regulated, multi-chain stablecoins. It is also designed to simplify the process of launching a stablecoin for projects and protocols.
categories: Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, Financial Services

description: Brale provides a platform for creating and managing stablecoins. The platform enables the issuance, redemption, and treasury management of regulated, multi-chain stablecoins. It is also designed to simplify the process of launching a stablecoin for projects and protocols.

description: Yellow Card is the largest and first licensed Stablecoin on/off ramp on the African continent, providing individuals and businesses of all sizes across 20 countries with secure and cost-effective methods to buy and sell USDT, USDC, and PYUSD via their local currency, directly and through its payments API. Yellow Card has facilitated over US$3 billion in transactions across Africa,
categories: Bitcoin, Cryptocurrency, FinTech, Trading Platform, Virtual Currency

description:
Eclipse is building Ethereum's first Solana Virtual Machine Layer 2. While other L2 networks on Ethereum focus on providing Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) compatibility, Eclipse leans into performance improvements developed by the Solana Layer 1 and adds additional verification features to deploy the blockchain as a rollup.

The Eclipse team includes veterans from dYdX, Uniswap, Citadel, and Airbnb. Eclipse Labs is backed by top investors including Polychain, Placeholder, and DBA.
categories: Blockchain, Ethereum

description:

The Eclipse team includes veterans from dYdX, Uniswap, Citadel, and Airbnb. Eclipse Labs is backed by top investors including Polychain, Placeholder, and DBA.
categories: Blockchain, Ethereum

description:
We are bringing over 1.5 billion people to the financial system through a USDC-based non-custodial & fully decentralized bank. Starting with LatAm SMBs.

Each user receives a USDC wallet, which protects against local inflation and generates yield from their saving circles. (ROSCAs).
Users spend or invest their saving circle dollars within our "Save now, buy later" marketplace.
We've created an AI credit-builder feature in WhatsApp that reports Roscas's activity to local credit bureaus.
categories: Artificial Intelligence (AI), FinTech, Software

description: Valora is a mobile crypto wallet that combines the power of blockchain and mobile with an intuitive user interface to make crypto easy to use. Valora makes crypto useful and accessible even on the most basic smartphones, enabling 6 billion smartphone users worldwide to reliably save, send, and spend crypto as easily as sending a text message.
categories: Blockchain, Financial Services, FinTech, Mobile Payments, Web3

description: Valora is a mobile crypto wallet that combines the power of blockchain and mobile with an intuitive user interface to make crypto easy to use. Valora makes crypto useful and accessible even on the most basic smartphones, enabling 6 billion smartphone users worldwide to reliably save, send, and spend crypto as easily as sending a text message.
categories: Blockchain, Financial Services, FinTech, Mobile Payments, Web3

description: Ostium delivers a decentralized trading platform that enables leveraged trading of real-world assets, including stocks, commodities, indices, foreign exchange, and cryptocurrencies, directly on-chain. Users maintain self-custody of their funds; trades, liquidity, and fees are publicly visible on a blockchain, removing reliance on traditional brokers. The platform offers up to 200× leverage and supports both long and short positions across a wide range of asset classes. Ostium uses real-time, low-latency price feeds via oracle systems to provide accurate and timely pricing. In addition, it recently introduced a points program that rewards user trading activity, referrals, and liquidity provision by converting on-platform engagement into a points ledger to track participation.
categories: Cryptocurrency, FinTech, Trading Platform

description: Superstate is a developer of legal and blockchain-based financial solutions. These solutions include short-term government bond funds that can be held in a cryptocurrency wallet or by a crypto custodian.
categories: Blockchain, Finance, Financial Services

description: Superstate is a developer of legal and blockchain-based financial solutions. These solutions include short-term government bond funds that can be held in a cryptocurrency wallet or by a crypto custodian.
categories: Blockchain, Finance, Financial Services

description: GaiaNet is a pioneer in decentralized AI technology, committed to transforming the IT industry through user privacy, transparency, and control. The cutting-edge open network infrastructure empowers users by ensuring privacy and censorship resistance in daily AI operations through a dynamic network of peer-to-peer edge nodes.
categories: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Blockchain, Information Technology, Internet

description: Kredete provides a suite of financial tools that enable African immigrants in the U.S. to send and receive money internationally while also building credit. The company facilitates mobile banking (including savings, debit cards, cash advances, and in-app payment services), mobile transfers and top-ups, plus credit building via on-time credit, transaction, and rent reporting. It also offers business solutions (merchant tools, checkout, and API), crypto services (buying, selling, transfers, rewards, borrowing), and an AI-assistant for budgeting, predictive analysis, spending & credit simulation. Kredete operates via licensed U.S. financial partners and integrates compliance, security measures like two-factor authentication, and FDIC insurance for eligible accounts.
categories: Credit, Financial Services, FinTech, Mobile Payments, Payments

description:
The TIE is the leading provider of information services for digital assets. Their core offering, the Crypto SigDev™ Terminal, is the fastest and most comprehensive workstation for institutional digital asset investors. SigDev brings together real-time news from thousands of primary sources, with sentiment analytics, spot and derivatives, alternative, and on-chain data in a powerful and intuitive platform.

The TIE's clients include the leading traditional and crypto-native hedge funds, OTC desks, market makers, trading venues, banks, sell-side firms, and other institutional market participants.
categories: Analytics, Cryptocurrency, Finance, Financial Services, FinTech

categories: Bitcoin, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, Ethereum, Finance, FinTech

description: Blockus is a company that provides an all-in-one ecosystem for Web3 gaming. It enables game studios to build quickly, reduce costs, and focus on gameplay. The company offers a seamlessly integrated WaaS and a first-party NFT marketplace. Blockus is also known for its beautifully built and fully compliant platform. It is backed by a16z CSS and is considered a platform that has taken gaming on Sei to a new level. Blockus is an alternative to companies like PLLAY Labs, Sandbox Network Technology, and Junglee Games.
categories: Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, Gaming, Marketplace, Web3

description: Magic is a wallet-as-a-service provider that helps businesses onboard users into web3 with instant non-custodial wallet creation. It uses email or social logins, while removing the need for seed phrases and browser extensions - making it indistinguishable from standard web2 experiences that everyday users are accustomed to. Magic offers features for end-to-end web3 onboarding including authentication, fiat onramps, NFT Minting and NFT Checkout. Its solutions are trusted by top brands in web2 and web3, including Mattel, Macy's, Xsolla, Immutable, and more. The company's solution makes use of a plug-and-play kit and blockchain infrastructure to enable individuals to build applications with quick, customized, password-less login with just a few lines of code, allowing developers to include password-less authentication in their applications.
categories: Cryptocurrency, Developer Tools, Identity Management, Information Technology, Security, Web3

It was created as an ERC-721 standard token, that powers most digital art and collectibles. The combination of Pudgy Penguin's aesthetics was randomly generated from over 150 hand-drawn traits.

description:
River Financial is a challenger financial institution specializing in Bitcoin financial services. River Financial's flagship product, a Bitcoin brokerage, provides sophisticated retail investors with a high-touch platform to buy and sell Bitcoin.

Founded in 2019 by Alexander Leishman and Andrew Benson, River's brokerage product provides its clients with best-in-class security, a world-class client service experience, and investment performance tools such as cost basis tracking.
categories: Bitcoin, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, Financial Exchanges, Financial Services, FinTech

description:
River Financial is a challenger financial institution specializing in Bitcoin financial services. River Financial's flagship product, a Bitcoin brokerage, provides sophisticated retail investors with a high-touch platform to buy and sell Bitcoin.

Founded in 2019 by Alexander Leishman and Andrew Benson, River's brokerage product provides its clients with best-in-class security, a world-class client service experience, and investment performance tools such as cost basis tracking.
categories: Bitcoin, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, Financial Exchanges, Financial Services, FinTech

description: Zerion is an investing app that enables anyone, anywhere in the world, to access a suite of new financial products and services built on the backbone of decentralized finance (DeFi). Simple, user-centered design is combined with a powerful tech stack that aggregates across every major decentralized exchange, offering users a single point of entry for managing their digital assets with ease. Zerion is non-custodial, which means users never delegate their funds to the platform. This agile approach mitigates centralization risk and has allowed Zerion to operate globally since inception.
categories: Asset Management, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, Decentralized Finance (DeFi), Ethereum, Finance, FinTech

description: Ripio, formerly known as Bitpagos, is a financial payments company that provides electronic payment solutions for businesses in Latin America. It offers a range of financial services for the emerging markets using blockchain technology to make a more accessible financial system. The company helps merchants process international transactions with credit cards or bitcoins for a fraction of the cost as well as consumers buy bitcoins instantly with cash. It deals with clients in Argentina, Brazil, Chile, and Ecuador.
categories: Bitcoin, Cryptocurrency, Finance, FinTech, Lending, Mobile Payments, Payments

description: Endstate offers shoes with digital features, enabling customers to avail of a physical product to wear and create a digital twin. The startup incorporates an NFC chip into the tongue of each sneaker, and its proprietary encoding process connects each NFC chip to an NFT. This physical-digital entanglement enables token-gated in-person and digital experiences available only to Endstate holders. They can use NFTs to connect experiences ranging from digital art to physical products, special access to our collaborators and their communities, and the ability to walk in the shoes of others in the metaverse (including video games and other online environments).
categories: Fashion, Manufacturing, Metaverse, Semiconductor, Shoes, Web3

description: Roll is social token infrastructure for the creator economy. It provides infrastructure and APIs that allow digital communities to create and integrate social tokens into both financial systems and social platforms. With social tokens, you can create units of value that exist independent of the platforms you are currently using. Roll is designed for anyone with a loyal following that wants to interact with their community across the web.
categories: Apps, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, Ethereum, Information Technology

Shield is a B2B crypto on/off ramp. Accept crypto from your customers while receiving USD wires in your bank. Licensed crypto exchange (VASP) and Money Services Business (MSB).

Founded by a team of ex-Facebook, McKinsey, Y Combinator, MIT & Princeton technologists. Backed by leading fin-tech investors including Giant Ventures, a16z crypto, Kraken, MoonPay, Factor Capital and angels from JP Morgan, Coinbase, AMEX, Bank of America, & Menlo Ventures.

description:
Alto Solutions delivers an easy-to-use, automated process for investing in alternatives with IRA savings. It aims to democratize alternative asset investing. AltoIRA offers an easy-to-use investing platform that empowers everyday investors to diversify their IRAs by investing in alternative assets such as private equity, venture capital, real estate, loans, and cryptocurrency. 

Offering Traditional, Roth, SEP, and Crypto IRAs, Alto is bringing alternative investments to the mainstream. Everyday investors can now easily and cost-effectively access their retirement savings to invest in assets once reserved solely for high-net-worth individuals.

It was founded in 2016 and is headquartered in Nashville, Tennessee.
categories: Financial Services, FinTech, Information Technology, Personal Finance

description: Utila provides a digital asset management platform for institutions to securely store, transfer, and manage digital assets. It uses Multi-Party Computation (MPC) technology to enhance security and control across multiple blockchains and wallets. The platform supports trading operations, payments, Treasury management, and tokenization. Utila also offers APIs and an SDK for developers to integrate its services into custom applications.
categories: Asset Management, Blockchain, Financial Services

description: Turnkey provides a streamlined wallet infrastructure platform designed for seamless integration into digital applications. It offers APIs for private key management, enabling developers to create non‑custodial wallets, sign transactions, and automate on‑chain actions. The platform supports embedded wallets, smart wallet signers, authentication mechanisms like OAuth and passkeys, as well as policy enforcement and session management. Turnkey operates within secure enclaves to maintain cryptographic security and is compatible across multiple blockchain networks. This modular system enables scalable wallet operations and efficient transaction handling through a unified interface.
categories: Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, Cyber Security, Developer APIs

description: YO is a multi-chain DeFi yield optimizer that allocates user deposits into a curated set of yield-generating pools across several blockchains, rebalancing them to target the best risk-adjusted yield using Exponential.fi’s risk ratings. It is positioned as an automated “set-and-forget” yield layer that abstracts away chain selection, strategy management, and rebalancing for both end users and integrators like wallets or fintech apps.
categories: Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, Decentralized Finance (DeFi), Web3

description:
EMTECH is a fintech company that modernizes central banks for financial inclusion and financial market resilience. It offers an API-First Platform that connects central banks and fintechs for embedded regulatory compliance and central bank digital currency.  The company is building the next generation of central banking infrastructure for the Web3 era.

The company was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

description: Verady provides accounting and audit products and infrastructure networks through the Ledgible platform, where financial institutions, corporations, and regulators can audit, account, and verify blockchain assets. Verady believes traditional accounting systems, firms, and standards are currently lacking functionality around blockchain assets. Verady's Ledgible platform will be the bridge between these new assets and traditional financial verification and accounting which is needed to further their acceptance and growth.
categories: Accounting, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, FinTech

description:
Continuum is the first tokenized learn-to-earn platform. We provide free short-form, TikTok style video and carousel courses for vocational learners worldwide. 

Content creators and learners earn crypto and NFTs for creating, learning and engaging with the network.

We are live on the web, iPhone and Android, with users in 107 countries.
categories: Apps, Blockchain, E-Learning, Education, Software

description: Pontoro Inc. is a financial technology company founded in late 2018 with a mission of facilitating broader investor participation in real-world, private market assets. The company is creating a patented, technology solution that will enable the creation of a new type of enhanced private investment platform with liquidity generally not readily available in traditional private investment opportunities.
categories: Blockchain, Financial Services, FinTech

description:
Bitwave is a developer of financial software that enables companies to include digital assets in their accounting records and operational procedures.

The company provides software that helps businesses easily manage their transactions involving digital assets. This software includes tax tracking, bookkeeping, Decentralized Finance (Defi) monitoring, and cryptocurrency accounts receivable or payable.
 
Bitwave was established in 2018 by Amy Kalnoki and Patrick White in San Francisco, California.
categories: Accounting, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, Financial Services, Information Technology, Software

description: D3 is a domain namespace network that connects identity and domain partners within web3 ecosystems. D3 connects web3 domains with the global domain name system, allowing them to function like regular domains. D3 enables access to web3 applications while maintaining compatibility with existing internet infrastructure.
categories: Domain Registrar, Information Technology, Software, Web3

description:
TBCASoft develops a high-performance, secure, scalable, cost-effective consortium-based blockchain platform specifically for the telecom and fintech industries.  
The TBCASoft HIVEX solution provides seamless interoperability between mobile payment services.  This helps telecom carriers create value added services and helps mobile payment providers grow the usability and acceptance of their solution in a cost-effective way.
categories: Blockchain, Financial Services, FinTech, Mobile, Retail, Software

description: Eluvio is transforming the management, distribution, and economics of premium digital content. The Eluvio Content Fabric is a utility blockchain network for owner-controlled storage, distribution, and monetization of digital content at scale. It provides live and file-based content publishing, transcoding, packaging, sequencing, and dynamic and static distribution, and minting of derivative NFTs for all ranges of content experiences
categories: Blockchain, Software, Video

description:
ZenLedger is an analytics startup that simplifies cryptocurrency taxes to help investors and tax professionals in portfolio management. Built by expert industry veterans in technology, finance, and accounting, it allows users to easily import crypto transactions, calculate gains and income, and prepare tax returns.

Its automated platform helps investors and tax professionals reduce the uncertainty, frustration, and manual grunt work of creating personal crypto brokerage accounts.
categories: Accounting, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, Decentralized Finance (DeFi), Financial Services, FinTech
